sys_update_xml.name: sys_embedded_help_content_89c789e1dbe31300603752b0cf961926
sys_update_xml.payload:
truemid-serverDownload MID Server files
Supported MID Server host operating systems:
  • Windows Server 2008, 2012, and 2016 editions
  • Linux Red Hat 6 and 7, Ubuntu 14-17, CentOS 6 and 7
  1. Select and download the MID Server for the appropriate operating system.
    If the download does not begin immediately, try again later when the system is not as busy.
  2. Save the download file to a temporary file on the local drive.
  3. Move the file into the designated MID Server folder you create for your operating system and run the installer from that location.
Related information
Install a MID Server on Linux
Install a MID Server on Windows
MID Server System Requirements
]]>2018-08-25 19:10:04normalmid_server_download_ui-normalmid_server_download_ui11000truesys_embedded_help_contentsystem2018-07-26 19:09:11global/89c789e1dbe31300603752b0cf9619262mid_server_download_ui-normal4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf9619274ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927sys_embedded_help_content_89c789e1dbe31300603752b0cf961926system2018-08-25 19:10:04k

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_816e55b9db631300603752b0cf961989
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_journal_field</collection><condition>gs.getProperty('x_82093_jira_sync.jira-integration-active')=="true" && gs.getSession().isInteractive()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Send Comment to JIRA</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var relTable= new GlideRecord('task');
	relTable.get(current.element_id);
	
	if(relTable.x_82093_jira_sync_sync_to_jira==true && !relTable.x_82093_jira_sync_jira_key.nil()){
		var tableName=relTable.getRecordClassName();
		
		var j = new x_82093_jira_sync.JiraSync();
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
		gr.get(current.element_id);
		if( gr.isValid() ){
							
			var commentIncident = {};
				commentIncident.body = ""+current.value; //Do not remove "" from the string. Required for REST.
			
			var instance = new GlideRecord("x_82093_jira_sync_instance_settings");
			instance.get(relTable.x_82093_jira_sync_jira_project.instance);
			
			var comm = j.addComment(commentIncident, relTable.x_82093_jira_sync_jira_key,"issue",gr.sys_id,instance);
			
			//gs.addInfoMessage("Status: " +comm);
			//gs.addInfoMessage(commentIncident.body);
		}
			
		}
		
	})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-27 15:27:52</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>816e55b9db631300603752b0cf961989</sys_id><sys_mod_count>33</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Send Comment to JIRA</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Sync" source="x_82093_jira_sync">4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Jira Sync">4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_816e55b9db631300603752b0cf961989</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-01 14:35:58</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=816e55b9db631300603752b0cf961989"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_5ce6a2c7dbe31300603752b0cf961937
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_82093_jira_sync_comments</collection><condition>gs.getProperty('x_82093_jira_sync.jira-integration-active')=="true"</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Get Comment from JIRA</name><order>200</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var journalEntry="** Update from Jira **"+"\n"+current.comment_body;
	if(current.source=="jira"){
		var recTask;
		recTask=new GlideRecord('task');
		recTask.addQuery('x_82093_jira_sync_jira_key',current.record_key);
		recTask.query();
		if(recTask.next()) {
			recTask.comments=journalEntry;
			recTask.update();
		}
		
	}
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-31 17:57:46</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5ce6a2c7dbe31300603752b0cf961937</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Comment from JIRA</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Sync" source="x_82093_jira_sync">4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Jira Sync">4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5ce6a2c7dbe31300603752b0cf961937</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-01 14:40:08</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5ce6a2c7dbe31300603752b0cf961937"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_388cd5dbdbb31300603752b0cf961933
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition><![CDATA[if(gs.getProperty('x_82093_jira_sync.jira-integration-active')=="true"){
	answer = true;
}
else {
	answer = false;
}]]></condition><conditional>true</conditional><name>Update Jira Status</name><run_as display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 00:15:00</run_period><run_start>2018-08-13 17:24:54</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[var instance = new GlideRecord("x_82093_jira_sync_instance_settings");
instance.orderBy('base_url');
instance.query();

while(instance.next()){
	var tblRecord;
	
	tblRecord=new GlideRecord('task');	
	tblRecord.addQuery('x_82093_jira_sync_jira_project.instance',instance.sys_id);
	tblRecord.query();
	
	while(tblRecord.next()){
		
		var rec = new x_82093_jira_sync.JiraSync().getIssueStatus(tblRecord.x_82093_jira_sync_jira_key,instance);
				
		if(rec.fields.status.id){
			
			var getStatus = new GlideRecord('x_82093_jira_sync_jira_status');
			getStatus.addQuery('status_id',rec.fields.status.id);
			getStatus.addQuery('instance',instance.sys_id);
			getStatus.query();
			
			if(getStatus.next()){
				tblRecord.x_82093_jira_sync_jira_status = getStatus.sys_id;
				tblRecord.update();
			}
		}
		
	}
	
	
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-13 17:28:00</sys_created_on><sys_id>388cd5dbdbb31300603752b0cf961933</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Jira Status</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Sync" source="x_82093_jira_sync">4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Jira Sync">4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_388cd5dbdbb31300603752b0cf961933</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-28 13:25:43</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_embedded_help_content_7499cd25dbe31300603752b0cf96194b
sys_update_xml.payload:
truemid-serverMID Server form

Use this form to configure a MID Server, define capabilities and the IP ranges in which it operates, and view log messages. Configuration parameters control the behavior of your MID Server when it connects to various devices in your network.

These parameters are required for the MID Server and are included by default when it is installed:
NameDescription
urlSpecifies the URL to the associated ServiceNow instance. Normally the URL is similar to https://instance.service-now.com, where you replace <instance> with the instance name.
mid_sys_idRecords the MID Server record's unique identifier. This parameter should be empty when you initially configure a MID Server . Do not change the value.
nameUse this parameter to supply a name that is meaningful for you. If you do not supply this parameter, the MID Server uses the default value.
mid.instance.usernameIf the instance has authentication enabled, set this parameter to the user name the MID Server should use to log in to the instance. This user should have the mid_server role on the instance to access necessary tables and fields.
mid.instance.passwordIf the instance has authentication enabled, set this parameter to define the password the MID Server should use to log in to the instance.
Related information
MID Server IP range auto-assignment

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_5893d917dbb31300603752b0cf9619c2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>task</collection><condition>gs.getProperty('x_82093_jira_sync.jira-integration-active')=="true"</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="task">x_82093_jira_sync_jira_keyVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="x_82093_jira_sync_jira_key" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Get Jira Status</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	
	var rec = new x_82093_jira_sync.JiraSync().getIssueStatus(current.x_82093_jira_sync_jira_key, current.x_82093_jira_sync_jira_project.instance);
	
	if(rec.fields.status.id){
		
		var getStatus = new GlideRecord('x_82093_jira_sync_jira_status');
		getStatus.addQuery('status_id',rec.fields.status.id);
		getStatus.addQuery('instance',current.x_82093_jira_sync_jira_project.instance);
		getStatus.query();
		
		if(getStatus.next()){
			current.x_82093_jira_sync_jira_status = getStatus.sys_id;
			current.update();
		}
	}
	
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-13 16:46:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5893d917dbb31300603752b0cf9619c2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Jira Status</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Sync" source="x_82093_jira_sync">4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Jira Sync">4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5893d917dbb31300603752b0cf9619c2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-27 17:10:28</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5893d917dbb31300603752b0cf9619c2"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_a73d2865dba31300603752b0cf9619a8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_82093_jira_sync.JiraSync</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>JiraSync</name><script><![CDATA[var JiraSync = Class.create();
JiraSync.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    pullJIRAProject : function(){
        // Updated by Joe Prewitt 07/19/2018
        var instance = new GlideRecord("x_82093_jira_sync_instance_settings");
        instance.query();

            while(instance.next()){

                var projReq = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Jira Sync REST', 'getResource');
                projReq.setStringParameter('base_url', instance.base_url);
                projReq.setStringParameter('resourceName', 'project');

                projReq.setAuthenticationProfile('basic',instance.authentication_profile);
                if(instance.midserver){
                    projReq.setMIDServer(instance.midserver.name);
                }

                var projResponse= projReq.execute();

                var retStatus=projResponse.getStatusCode();
                var projResponseBody=projResponse.getBody();

                var jParse = JSON.parse(projResponseBody);
                var recordLength=jParse.length;

                for(var i=0;i<recordLength;i++){
                  var relRecCheck=new GlideRecord('x_82093_jira_sync_jira_projects');
                  relRecCheck.addQuery('key',jParse[i].key);
                  relRecCheck.query();
                  if(!relRecCheck.next()){
                     relRecCheck.key = jParse[i].key;
                     relRecCheck.name = jParse[i].name;
                     relRecCheck.instance = instance.sys_id;
                     relRecCheck.insert();
                  }

                }

            }

    },

    pullJIRAStatus : function(){
        // Updated by Joe Prewitt 07/19/2018
        var instance = new GlideRecord("x_82093_jira_sync_instance_settings");
        instance.query();

            while(instance.next()){

                var status = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Jira Sync REST', 'getStatus');
                status.setStringParameter('base_url', instance.base_url);

                status.setAuthenticationProfile('basic',instance.authentication_profile);
                if(instance.midserver){
                    status.setMIDServer(instance.midserver.name);
                }

                var statusResponse= status.execute();

                var responseStatus=statusResponse.getStatusCode();
                var statusResponseBody=statusResponse.getBody();

                var jParse = JSON.parse(statusResponseBody);
                var recordLength=jParse.length;

                for(var i=0;i<recordLength;i++){
                  var relRecCheck=new GlideRecord('x_82093_jira_sync_jira_status');
                  relRecCheck.addQuery('instance',instance.sys_id);
                  relRecCheck.addQuery('status_id',jParse[i].id);
                  relRecCheck.query();
                  if(!relRecCheck.next()){
                     relRecCheck.status_id = jParse[i].id;
                     relRecCheck.status_name = jParse[i].name;
                     relRecCheck.instance = instance.sys_id;
                     relRecCheck.insert();
                  }

                }

            }

    },

    addComment : function( comment, key,resourceName, parent, instance ){
        // Updated by Joe Prewitt 07/19/2018

        var json = new global.JSON();
        //var body = json.encode(comment);
        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Jira Sync REST', 'postComment');
        r.setAuthenticationProfile('basic',instance.authentication_profile);
        if(instance.midserver){
            r.setMIDServer(instance.midserver.name);
        }
        r.setStringParameterNoEscape('commentBody', json.encode(comment));
        r.setStringParameter('base_url', instance.base_url);
        r.setStringParameter("resourceName", resourceName);
        r.setStringParameter("id", key);
        var resBody = r.execute();

        var commResponseBody = resBody.getBody();
		var status = resBody.getStatusCode();
        var jParse = JSON.parse(commResponseBody);

        var jComments=new GlideRecord('x_82093_jira_sync_comments');
        jComments.addQuery('comment_id',jParse.id);
        jComments.query();
        if(!jComments.next()){
            jComments.comment_id = jParse.id;
            jComments.comment_body = jParse.body;
            jComments.record_key = key;
            jComments.parend_record = parent;
            jComments.source = "servicenow";
            jComments.insert();
        }
		
		return status + " Body: "+comment+" "+commResponseBody;


    },

    getComments: function(key, instance){
        // Updated by Joe Prewitt 07/19/2018

        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Jira Sync REST', 'getComments');
        r.setAuthenticationProfile('basic',instance.authentication_profile);
        if(instance.midserver){
            r.setMIDServer(instance.midserver.name);
        }
        r.setStringParameter('base_url', instance.base_url);
        r.setStringParameter("issueKey", key);
        var response = r.execute();
        var body = response.getBody();
        var returnParse = JSON.parse(body);

        return returnParse;
    },

    getIssueStatus: function(key, instance){
        // Updated by Joe Prewitt 08/13/2018

        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Jira Sync REST', 'getIssue');
        r.setAuthenticationProfile('basic',instance.authentication_profile);
        if(instance.midserver){
            r.setMIDServer(instance.midserver.name);
        }
        r.setStringParameter('base_url', instance.base_url);
        r.setStringParameter('issueKey', key);

        var response = r.execute();
        var body = response.getBody();
        var returnParse = JSON.parse(body);

        return returnParse;
    },

    type: 'JiraSync'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-26 17:21:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>a73d2865dba31300603752b0cf9619a8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>32</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JiraSync</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Sync" source="x_82093_jira_sync">4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Jira Sync">4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a73d2865dba31300603752b0cf9619a8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-27 16:32:48</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_85bde507db631300603752b0cf9619cb
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition><![CDATA[if(gs.getProperty('x_82093_jira_sync.jira-integration-active')=="true"){
	answer = true;
}
else {
	answer = false;
}]]></condition><conditional>true</conditional><name>Get Jira Comments</name><run_as display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 00:15:00</run_period><run_start>2018-07-31 13:45:50</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[        var instance = new GlideRecord("x_82093_jira_sync_instance_settings");
        instance.orderBy('base_url');
        instance.query();

        while(instance.next()){
            var tblRecord;

            tblRecord=new GlideRecord('task');
            tblRecord.addQuery('x_82093_jira_sync_sync_to_jira',true);
            tblRecord.addQuery('x_82093_jira_sync_jira_project.instance',instance.sys_id);
            tblRecord.query();

            while(tblRecord.next()){

                var rec = new x_82093_jira_sync.JiraSync().getComments(tblRecord.x_82093_jira_sync_jira_key,instance);

                var recordLength=rec.comments.length;

                for(var i=0;i<recordLength;i++){
                    var jComments=new GlideRecord('x_82093_jira_sync_comments');
                    jComments.addQuery('comment_id',rec.comments[i].id);
                    jComments.query();

                    if(!jComments.next()){

                        jComments.initialize();
                        jComments.comment_id = rec.comments[i].id;
                        jComments.comment_body = rec.comments[i].body;
                        jComments.record_key = tblRecord.x_82093_jira_sync_jira_key;
                        jComments.parend_record = tblRecord.sys_id;                        
                        jComments.source = "jira";
                        jComments.insert();
                    }



                }

            }


        }
]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-31 14:01:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>85bde507db631300603752b0cf9619cb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Jira Comments</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Sync" source="x_82093_jira_sync">4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Jira Sync">4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_85bde507db631300603752b0cf9619cb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-15 14:27:48</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_a5f335dbdbf31300603752b0cf9619ad
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>task</collection><condition>gs.getProperty('x_82093_jira_sync.jira-integration-active')=="true"</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="task">x_82093_jira_sync_jira_statusVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="x_82093_jira_sync_jira_status" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Jira Status Change</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var triggerRule = new GlideRecord('x_82093_jira_sync_trigger_rules');
	triggerRule.addQuery('jira_project',current.x_82093_jira_sync_jira_project);
	triggerRule.addQuery('jira_status_to_trigger',current.x_82093_jira_sync_jira_status);
	triggerRule.query();
	
	if(triggerRule.next()){
		var rec = new x_82093_jira_sync.JiraSync().getComments(current.x_82093_jira_sync_jira_key,current.x_82093_jira_sync_jira_project.instance);
		
		var recordLength=rec.comments.length;
		var recId=rec.comments.length-1;
		
		if(recordLength>0){
			var jComments=new GlideRecord('x_82093_jira_sync_comments');
			jComments.addQuery('comment_id',rec.comments[recId].id);
			jComments.query();
			
			if(!jComments.next()){
				
				jComments.initialize();
				jComments.comment_id = rec.comments[recId].id;
				jComments.comment_body = rec.comments[recId].body;
				jComments.record_key = current.x_82093_jira_sync_jira_key;
				jComments.parend_record = current.sys_id;				
				jComments.source = "jira";
				jComments.insert();
			}
		}
	}
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-13 19:08:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a5f335dbdbf31300603752b0cf9619ad</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Jira Status Change</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Sync" source="x_82093_jira_sync">4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Jira Sync">4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a5f335dbdbf31300603752b0cf9619ad</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-14 18:59:16</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a5f335dbdbf31300603752b0cf9619ad"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_properties</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_properties">sys_id=6d1a2ee9dbb75300603752b0cf9619d9^EQ<item endquery="false" field="sys_id" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="6d1a2ee9dbb75300603752b0cf9619d9"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Change Frequency for Jira Sync Comments</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var myTime = current.value;
	var dur = new GlideDuration('0 00:'+myTime+':00');
	
	var autoScript = new GlideRecord('sysauto_script');
	autoScript.addQuery('name','Get Jira Comments');
	autoScript.query();
	
	if(autoScript.next()){		
		autoScript.run_period = dur;
		autoScript.update();
	}
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-08 12:43:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>27aa262ddbb75300603752b0cf9619e6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Change Frequency for Jira Sync Comments</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Sync" source="x_82093_jira_sync">4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Jira Sync">4ff1fb11db231300603752b0cf961927</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_27aa262ddbb75300603752b0cf9619e6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-08 14:07:49</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=27aa262ddbb75300603752b0cf9619e6"/></record_update>
